title: Machine Learning-Based VOF Algorithm Design for Compressible Flow Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary fluid mechanics and numerical analysis knowledge, programming experience (Python/C++), and machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented project-based learning in BYOD environments, utilizing personal devices for simulation development.

learning_goals: They can explain the fundamental principles of the VOF-ML algorithm for solving compressible fluid dynamics problems.
They can implement a VOF-ML scheme for compressible Euler calculations using multi-material machine learning datasets.
They can design a compressible solver with symmetry-preserving techniques on orthogonal grids.
They can evaluate the accuracy of the VOF-ML scheme for various interfaces (sharp/Leapfrog/triple-point).
They can analyze the performance of the VOF-ML algorithm by comparing it with SLIC/Downwind methods.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
